main.name: Aby Arakkal
main.description: I provide Comprehensive solutions for both Front and Middle Office leveraging tools and platforms that form the vision and backbone of the Organization
main.bio: At core, I'm a tech enthusiast. I went from building PCs and making fun programs using Basic and C++ during my teenage years into an IT professional, and subsequently, an Investment Banking Technologist. Deep down I'm still a hacker at heart :)
main.contactmessage: If you like what you see and would like to get to know more about me, feel free to reach out to me:

resume.skillmessage: From amusing colleagues at my Computer lab to this very day. I am developer by heart, but I found my Career doing Application Support. Apparently, I was a natural at it. But eventually, found my middle ground doing DevOps.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Have done everything under the sky for Fixed Income Interest Rates Derivatives Desk  across Front Office and Middle Office.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Started of as CRM Support and transitioned into Development. Later transitioned into Web development and Flex Projects.

education.description: Learned a lot of new hings here, perseverance being the most important one.
I found my passion for Computers in my high school. But it was the lack of passion for religion that made me popular.

testimonials.text: Abdul has a great vision and energy for applications support and control. In depth knowledge. Great communicator. Pragmatic and disciplined. Helps to build and maintain high value support relationships front to back.

I have known Aby since our school days and have always considered his infectiously cheerful personality as his biggest strength. We literally started learning 'a-b-c's of our programming life together and I always consider the hobbyist programs we tried back in Panampilly Nagar days as ideal starts I had in my career. Above all, he is a great friend to be with and you could rely on him at any time.
